fields.label: Enable Nav Block
fields.name: enable_nav_block
fields.instructions: This will create jump links in the sidebar to any content blocks created below. Probably best used on pages rather than events

fields.label: Enable Child Page Nav
fields.name: child_page_nav
fields.instructions: Will only work on pages, not events

sub_fields.label: Info
sub_fields.name: info
sub_fields.instructions: For longish bits of text. Will be divided into two columns

sub_fields.label: Link Title
sub_fields.name: link_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will default to the title of the linked page if left blank

sub_fields.label: Embedded Media
sub_fields.name: embedded_media
sub_fields.instructions: Add the url from Youtube or Vimeo

sub_fields.label: Google Map Embed
sub_fields.name: google_map_embed_url
sub_fields.instructions: From Google Maps, click share, and then Embed a Map. Paste the code here

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Will default to the page or post title if left blank

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Will default to 'More' if left blank
